page.title: 03SADDLEWORTH RANGERS ARLC
page.content: Saddleworth Rangers have been playing Rugby League in Greenfield for over 50 years and have developed from a Club having one team to having first class facilities for seven teams from under elevens to Open Age. Originally with the Oldham League, they expanded into the Pennine League which was a founder member of the British Amateur Rugby League Association which severed the administrative links with the professional game. Many players have gone on to play in the professional ranks but the character of Rangers has always been to promote 'Rugby League for all' and to change the image of the game from 'flat cap and tin baths' to one of first class playing and social facilities.
